name: SuperQuizoftheDay
0:
”Alexa, Launch Super Quiz of the Day”
”Repeat the question”
”Is the answer, A”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: super quiz of the day
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Super Quiz of the Day, hosted by Jon Culshaw and friends.

You can answer a new multiple-choice question every day, selected from a variety of categories and hosted by one of our quirky famous guests.

Here are some things you can say
---------------------------------
"Launch Super Quiz of the Day"
"Repeat the Question"
"Let's Go"
"I think the answer is (A, B, C)"
"Help"

⭐ Premium Subscription ⭐
With Super Quiz of the Day Premium, you can unlock three extra multiple-choice questions every day, as well as the ability to compete on our global leader boards.

To get started, simply say: "Alexa, Launch Super Quiz of the Day".

FEEDBACK:
